short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Krafty is HTML Checker for Web Director

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Krafty has 5 functions.

Head Checker
Display title,description,OGP... etc.

Nest Checker
This feature verifies tag nesting.If nothing goes wrong.

Outline Checker
Display outline all elements.

Alt Checker
Display Alt.

Brightness Checker
Make the page monochrome.
